snippet: Alan Pean drove himself to St. Joseph Medical Center in Houston seeking treatment for mental health distress. During an altercation in his room with two off-duty police officers working as security guards, he was stunned with a Taser and shot in the chest, then charged with assault and reckless driving. Here are legal documents and the police report, redacted by the Police Department.
lead_paragraph: Alan Pean drove himself to St. Joseph Medical Center in Houston seeking treatment for mental health distress. During an altercation in his room with two off-duty police officers working as security guards, he was stunned with a Taser and shot in the chest, then charged with assault and reckless driving. Here are legal documents and the police report, redacted by the Police Department.

headline.main: Police Report and Charges Involving Alan Pean
